title: Profile
desc: Configure application related settings for the friends app on your profile.

fields.label: Show friends
fields.tooltip: If enabled, your friends will be displayed in your profile as a widget to others who view your profile.
fields.name: profile_show_friends

fields.label: Show mutual friends
fields.tooltip: If enabled, your mutual friends will be displayed in your profile as a widget to others who view your profile.
fields.name: profile_show_mutual

fields.label: Item limit
fields.tooltip: Configure how many users you want to display.
fields.name: profile_show_limit

title: Dashboard
desc: Configure application related settings for the friends app on your dashboard.

fields.label: Show friends
fields.tooltip: If enabled, your friends will be displayed in your dashboard.
fields.name: dashboard_show_friends

fields.label: Show online friends
fields.tooltip: If enabled, your online friends will be displayed in your dashboard.
fields.name: dashboard_show_online

fields.label: Show friend suggestions
fields.tooltip: If enabled, a list of friend suggestions will be displayed in your dashboard.
fields.name: dashboard_show_suggest

fields.label: Item limit
fields.tooltip: Configure how many users you want to display.
fields.name: dashboard_show_limit
